name: Baggie Stacker (taleofluthien)
description:
This game was developed by "Team Offlayn" in 48 hours, in the first tour of the "Turkish Game Development Championship" organized by GameCircle.

All assets modelled by our 3D artists.

Team:

Ece İrem Akşit (3D Artist)

Mert Kılıç (3D Artist)

Mert Göktuğ Yiğit (Game Developer)

Kaan Karahanci (Game Developer)

Berke Konargöçer (Game Developer)
